Name: David Winner
Review: David has been selling diamonds for 15 years. His product features combines nobel and art. He earned his reputation by his great products and customer service and honest.

Name: Richard Slim
Review: Richard owns his diamond factory in South Africa. He has more than 50 world class crafters working with him to polish the best diamonds.

Name: Qiang Xiao
Review: Diamond phone giant who provides the most luxury phone decorated with diamond to the valuable customers. All the diamond are real and the decoration are well designed by himself and other world class artist.
